application_credentials.description:
To create the credential needed for nibe uplink authentication.
1. Go to [Applications](https://api.nibeuplink.com/Applications) and click *Create Credentials*.
1. Enter a friendly name for example: `Home Assistant` and possible a description.
1. Enter `{redirect_url}` as *Callback URL*
1. Copy *Identifier* to *OAuth Client ID*.
1. Copy *Secret* to *OAuth Client Secret*
1. Accept the nibe service agreement and press *Create application*
